Room.Name: Dragonwares
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Dragonwares, a fantastic shop that sells all sort of wierd and powerful objects from all over Oceancrest and perhaps from other lands.
Room.LongDescription: Dragonwares is a specialty shop which used to be owned by Conan, the Dragon-Slayer. Conan was a high level leader of Oceancrest's heros and warriors, and often had rare items for sale. This was his shop before he died on April 1, 1994, to get a 'real life.' Conan was a member of the Mordor elite for more than three years, but decided an addiction like this was just too time consuming. It may happen to you.
